HotelElement.Name: High Tech Petit Palace Ducal Chueca

Description.Text:
Free WIFI in the centre of Madrid! Discover the city from this excellent location. Enjoy your stay with free bicycle rent, hydro massage showers, free safety boxes (with capacity for PCs) daily press and complementary bedding and food bowls for your pets.

Petit Palace Ducal hotel is located in the lively Chueca neighbourhood, near to the Gran Via, it is the ideal start point to discover the best restaurants and shops in the area and the main tourist attractions.

The hotel offers the following FREE services:

Daily Press Safety boxes ( with capacity for a laptop) WIFI connection in all rooms and communal zones. Hydro massage showers in all rooms. Information on local excursions, city maps, reservations for shows and restaurants. Two internet points for public use. Free bike rent. Luggage room. 20% discount in the public parking in the Plaza del Carmen, (minimum 24 hours) please ask at the reception for more details.

All rooms are renovated in Summer'2012: Double rooms are available with twin or double beds, for individual travellers or couples, and also for families or groups of friends in our exclusive Family Rooms with capacity of up to for people.

Take advantage of our two free internet points, found in the reception area, and our free bike rent to get to know the city in a unique and original way.

Ask our friendly staff for advice on the best shopping and dining areas, and for reservations for local excursions and shows. Dont hesitate to contact us if you are travelling with your pet or have any other special requests we will do our best to assure that your stay is a pleasant and comfortable as possible!

By reserving in our hotel you will receive an exclusive invitation to a typical Spanish tapa and glass of wine in the department store El Corte Ingles nearest to the hotel. One invitation per person. More information at the reception. Valid during 2009 while stocks last.

High Tech Hotels collaborates with the N.P.O Solidarity International by supporting the organization of artisan objects; SELYN of Sri Lanka through buying their hand made dolls by which they contribute to improving the living conditions of the families of Kunergala, Sri Lanka.

The hotel is within walking distance of the old quarters of Madrid; where you can enjoy museums, theatres, and cinemas...In addition to enjoy a variety of restaurants and the best typical "tapas" bars, you will also find very near the most famous flamenco tablaos, besides being able to take the bus tour, which runs through the main streets of Madrid. Located 2 minutes away from the 'Puerta del Sol', 'Plaza Mayor', 'Palacio Real', and 'Plaza de Espaa'. It is a 5 minutes walk to the Museum of Prado, the Museum Thyssen-Bornemiszma and within 10 minutes distance of the Museum of Comtemporary Art 'Reina Sofia' and the train station 'Ave-Atocha'.

Family Room - ALL Family rooms (with capacity up to 4 persons) ideal for families or groups of friends, include 26" flat screen televisions with international channels, free WIFI connection, hydro-massage showers and free safety boxes. Double or twin beds available with exterior or interior views (on request), a free gift for children(subject to availability).
Standard Room - ALL double and single rooms include 26" flat screen televisions with international channels, free WIFI connection, hydro-massage showers and free safety boxes. Double or twin beds available with exterior or interior views (on request).
